      返回ConnectionPool的org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ConnectionPool DataSourceProxy.createPool()
      Sets up the connection pool, by creating a pooling driver.
      ConnectionPool ProxyConnection.getParentPool() 
      ConnectionPool ProxyConnection.getPool() 
      ConnectionPool DataSourceProxy.getPool() 
      参数类型为ConnectionPool的org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void JdbcInterceptor.disconnected(ConnectionPool parent, PooledConnection con, boolean finalizing)
      Called when Connection.close() is called on the underlying connection.
      void JdbcInterceptor.poolClosed(ConnectionPool pool)
      This method is invoked by a connection pool when the pool is closed.
      void JdbcInterceptor.poolStarted(ConnectionPool pool)
      This method is invoked by a connection pool when the pool is first started up, usually when the first connection is requested.
      void TrapException.reset(ConnectionPool parent, PooledConnection con)
      no-op for this interceptor. no state is stored.
      void ProxyConnection.reset(ConnectionPool parent, PooledConnection con) 
      abstract void JdbcInterceptor.reset(ConnectionPool parent, PooledConnection con)
      Gets called each time the connection is borrowed from the pool This means that if an interceptor holds a reference to the connection the interceptor can be reused for another connection.
      void DisposableConnectionFacade.reset(ConnectionPool parent, PooledConnection con) 
      void ProxyConnection.setPool(ConnectionPool pool) 
      参数类型为ConnectionPool的org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      PooledConnection(PoolConfiguration prop, ConnectionPool parent)
      Constructor
      ProxyConnection(ConnectionPool parent, PooledConnection con, boolean useEquals)
